tasks.task: Display basic DICOM file information
tasks.explanation: dcmdump sample_data/sample.dcm (display all DICOM tags and values from file). Shows complete DICOM header with tag numbers, value representations, and actual values in human-readable format.
tasks.use_case: Basic DICOM file inspection and metadata review

tasks.task: Extract specific patient information from DICOM file
tasks.explanation: dcmdump +P 0010,0010 (patient name) +P 0010,0020 (patient ID) +P 0010,0030 (patient birth date) sample_data/sample.dcm. The +P flag prints only specified tags, useful for extracting specific information.
tasks.warnings: Handle patient data according to privacy regulations
tasks.use_case: Patient identification and demographic information extraction

tasks.task: Display study and series information
tasks.explanation: dcmdump +P 0008,0020 (study date) +P 0008,0030 (study time) +P 0008,0060 (modality) +P 0020,000d (study instance UID) +P 0020,000e (series instance UID) sample_data/sample.dcm. Extracts key study and series identification information.
tasks.use_case: Study organization and series identification for PACS systems

tasks.task: Extract image dimensions and pixel information
tasks.explanation: dcmdump +P 0028,0010 (rows) +P 0028,0011 (columns) +P 0028,0100 (bits allocated) +P 0028,0101 (bits stored) +P 0028,0102 (high bit) sample_data/sample.dcm. Shows image matrix size and pixel data characteristics.
tasks.use_case: Image processing preparation and display configuration

tasks.task: Extract equipment and acquisition parameters
tasks.explanation: dcmdump +P 0008,0070 (manufacturer) +P 0008,1090 (manufacturer model) +P 0018,0015 (body part examined) +P 0018,0050 (slice thickness) +P 0018,0060 (kVp) sample_data/sample.dcm. Extracts equipment information and acquisition parameters.
tasks.use_case: Equipment inventory and imaging protocol verification

tasks.task: Search for specific values in DICOM tags
tasks.explanation: dcmdump sample_data/sample.dcm (dump all DICOM tags) | grep -i "modality\|patient" (case-insensitive search for lines containing 'modality' or 'patient'). Useful for finding specific information without knowing exact tag numbers.
tasks.use_case: Quick information lookup and DICOM tag discovery

tasks.task: Convert DICOM file to different transfer syntax
tasks.explanation: dcmconv +te (convert to explicit VR little endian transfer syntax) sample_data/sample.dcm (input file) sample_data/sample_explicit.dcm (output file). Changes internal encoding while preserving all DICOM data.
tasks.use_case: DICOM compatibility conversion for different systems

tasks.task: Compress DICOM file using JPEG compression
tasks.explanation: dcmconv +ej (compress using JPEG baseline compression) sample_data/sample.dcm (input file) sample_data/sample_jpeg.dcm (output compressed file). Reduces file size while maintaining diagnostic quality.
tasks.warnings: JPEG compression may affect image quality
tasks.use_case: Storage optimization and network transmission efficiency

tasks.task: Remove patient identifying information from DICOM file
tasks.explanation: dcmodify -ea "(0010,0010)=ANONYMOUS" (modify patient name to ANONYMOUS) -ea "(0010,0020)=ANON001" (modify patient ID to ANON001) sample_data/sample.dcm. The -ea flag modifies or adds tags with specified values.
tasks.warnings: Ensure compliance with data protection regulations
tasks.use_case: Data anonymization for research and teaching purposes

tasks.task: Update study date and description
tasks.explanation: dcmodify -ea "(0008,0020)=20240115" (set study date to January 15, 2024) -ea "(0008,1030)=Research Study" (set study description) sample_data/sample.dcm. Modifies study-level metadata.
tasks.use_case: Study reclassification and metadata correction

tasks.task: Convert DICOM image to PNG format
tasks.explanation: dcm2pnm +op (output PNG format) sample_data/sample.dcm (input DICOM file) sample_data/image.png (output PNG file). Converts DICOM pixel data to standard image format for viewing.
tasks.use_case: Image export for presentations and non-medical viewers

tasks.task: Convert DICOM with specific window/level settings
tasks.explanation: dcm2pnm +W 400 40 (apply window width 400 and window center 40 for tissue contrast optimization) +op (PNG output) sample_data/sample.dcm sample_data/windowed.png. Applies specific contrast settings during conversion.
tasks.use_case: Diagnostic image display with optimized contrast for specific tissues

tasks.task: Decompress JPEG-compressed DICOM and export as image
tasks.explanation: dcmj2pnm sample_data/sample_jpeg.dcm (input JPEG-compressed DICOM) sample_data/decompressed.png (output PNG). Handles JPEG decompression and converts to standard image format.
tasks.use_case: Legacy JPEG DICOM handling and image extraction

tasks.task: Validate DICOM file compliance with IOD standards
tasks.explanation: dciodvfy sample_data/sample.dcm (validate DICOM file against Information Object Definition standards). Checks for required tags, valid values, and DICOM compliance issues.
tasks.use_case: Quality assurance and DICOM conformance testing

tasks.task: Generate structured filename from DICOM metadata
tasks.explanation: dcmdspfn -k PatientName -k StudyDate -k Modality (generate filename using patient name, study date, and modality keys) sample_data/sample.dcm. Creates standardized filename based on DICOM metadata for organized file storage.
tasks.use_case: Automated file organization and PACS archiving systems

tasks.task: Test if file is valid DICOM format
tasks.explanation: dcmftest sample_data/sample.dcm (test if file is valid DICOM format). Returns exit code 0 for valid DICOM files, non-zero for invalid files. Quick validation without detailed parsing.
tasks.use_case: Batch file validation and quality control in medical imaging workflows

tasks.task: Create DICOM media directory structure
tasks.explanation: dcmgpdir -v (verbose output) +r (recursive directory scan) sample_data/ (source directory with DICOM files) DICOMDIR (output directory file). Creates DICOM media interchange directory structure for CD/DVD distribution.
tasks.use_case: Medical media creation for patient data distribution and archival

tasks.task: Create DICOMDIR file for medical media
tasks.explanation: dcmmkdir DICOMDIR (create DICOMDIR file) sample_data/*.dcm (include all DICOM files from directory). Creates directory structure file required for DICOM media interchange standard.
tasks.use_case: Prepare DICOM datasets for CD/DVD distribution to patients or referring physicians

tasks.task: Send DICOM file to remote PACS server
tasks.explanation: dcmsend -v (verbose output) localhost (PACS server hostname) 11112 (DICOM port, typically 104 or 11112) sample_data/sample.dcm (file to send). Transmits DICOM file using DICOM network protocol to PACS system.
tasks.warnings: Requires properly configured DICOM network and PACS server
tasks.use_case: Medical image transmission between imaging devices and PACS systems

tasks.task: Start DICOM receive server to accept incoming images
tasks.explanation: dcmrecv -v (verbose output) 11112 (listening port for DICOM connections) +sd sample_data/received/ (store received files in specified directory). Starts DICOM SCP (Service Class Provider) server to receive medical images from imaging devices.
tasks.warnings: Press Ctrl+C to stop server, ensure port 11112 is available
tasks.use_case: PACS server implementation and medical image reception from modalities
